Node.Text: I know you're questioning everyone, but to be honest, it's getting a bit tiring, dear. Where I'm going is my business only.
I'm going to the florist's. I'm hoping they have something I need.
Do you have any enemies in the apartment complex?
A-As far as I know, n-no, I currently don't. I wish to keep it that way.
N-no, I certainly hope not! I try to be kind to everyone here. That Mr. Lindson, though... he held quite a reputation. Not necessarily positive, mind you.
I-I... didn't mean anything by it. I liked him well enough, as you know. Others didn't feel the same.
Mr. Lindson owned a number of strange business ventures. Not only was he an entrepreneur, he never seemed to care about risks taken at the expense of others.
I suppose what I mean to say is that the man was eccentric. Fine in moderation, but when you fly too high, the fall becomes much more painful.
Node.Hint: Caroline seems to have a hidden history with Mr. Lindson.

Node.Text: Your stutter is gone. You seem more composed since I last saw you.
Do I? I hardly know what you're talking about. I assure you I've been fine.
Thank you for talking to me, Steve. With all that's going on around here, it is very comforting.
However, as a word of warning... be more careful with your interrogations. Some may not take them as kindly as I have. We don't need more blood spilled within these walls.
